name: Purdue Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup milk
flour
2 cups chocolate chips
directions:
Mix in bowl and stir
Scoop onto cookie sheet
Bake in oven 40 minutes

directions:
Crack eggs into bowl and separate from yolk
Mix with other ingredients

name: Secret Krabby Patty Formula
ingredients:
8oz ground beef
Dash of pepper
Tomatoes
Lettuce
Special seasoning
Wheat hamburger buns
directions:
Press beef into patty
Add seasoning
Put patty on bun
Add toppings
